Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's a wild world outside the village, what
with all the Upheaval stuff going on. And
even here, there's that <clr:0000>election business<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It's a wild world outside the village, what
with all the Upheaval stuff going on. And
even here, we just had that <clr:0000>election stuff<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeah, some folks in the village are going
ahead with preparations for the elections
for the next mayor.<sp:0:4:0>Things between Cece and Reede got
pretty heated, I guess.<sp:0:4:0>Not that I much care who's mayor around
this place.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Although, here's a thought. What if I was
mayor? <sp:5:0:0>I bet things would turn around
for me then, yes, sir.
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We had that election to decide who's
gonna be the next village mayor.<sp:0:4:0>Well, sort of. In the end, Cece withdrew
from the race, so Reede's gonna keep
being mayor by default.<sp:0:4:0>They both care a little too much about
what happens to the village, if you
ask me.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Maybe I should've thrown my hat in.<sp:5:0:0>
I bet things would turn around for me
if I was mayor, yes, sir.
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well?<sp:5:0:0> Need me for anything else?
I'm kinda busy checking out the
village entrance.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>How come it's never a cute girl that comes along
to distract me from watch duty?<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It's a wild world outside the village, what
with all the Upheaval stuff going on.
I gotta hold fast and protect Ms. Ivee.
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>See you. And if you're thinking of making
a move on the ladies, do it someplace
else, will ya?
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's gotta be tough out there what with
the Upheaval. Stuff falling out of the sky,
monster attacks left and right...<sp:0:4:0>Not here though. Yours truly keeps
watch over the entrance, day and night,
to make sure of it.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Thanks to the Cece brand, we see more
people coming and going from the village.<sp:0:4:0>I'm just checking out the beauties—<sp:5:1:0>
Uh, I mean tourists— Wait, I mean
suspicious characters! Yeah, that's it!<sp:0:4:0>Although...<sp:5:0:0>now that you brought up
beauties, no one else holds a candle
to Ms. Ivee.<sp:0:4:0>Then again, <sp:5:0:0>the <clr:0000>princess <clr:ffff>of Hyrule Castle
who used to stay in the house to the
<clr:0000>south <clr:ffff>of the village? <sp:5:0:0>She was all right.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Still didn't hold a candle to
Ms. Ivee though.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>You collect some hot-footed frogs for me,
I collect a few more myself, and Ms. Ivee
will be swept right off her feet!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Or so that friend's friend I was talking
about said, I think. <sp:5:0:0>Either way, I owe
you one.<sp:0:4:0>So...did you want something?
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>I'm here on duty, checking on Ms. Ivee.<sp:5:0:0>
Sorry, no. <sp:5:1:0>I mean I'm keeping watch over
the village entrance.<sp:0:4:0>Too busy for chat, sad to say.
